txt.en: Talk to Natholan at Echad Lendir

'I suspected as much on the way up from Melgobas. Hello, stranger!

'The creaks from my waggon worried me. I was not confident I could make it to Iáphel, much less meet my travelling companions up on the ridge.

'I have found the culprit. The spokes are about to give. Could you perhaps aid me?

'I couldn't find a suitable spare wheel in Barad Faen, but I'm almost certain there exists one in Lond Cirion.

'Would you be so kind as to fetch me a spare wheel?'
Find a spare waggon wheel in Lond Cirion
Natholan has asked you to find a spare wheel in Lond Cirion.\n\nLond Cirion can be found to the west.
'Ah, this should perform splendidly! Not only can I join my companions up on the ridge, but I should be able to make the remainder of the trip to Iáphel.\n\n'You have my gratitude, traveller.'
You have found a suitable spare waggon wheel
You have found a suitable spare wheel for Natholan's waggon. Return it to Natholan just outside of Echad Lendir.\n\nEchad Lendir can be found to the east along the road to Barad Faen.
